segments.text: Front desk . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to check out tomorrow but will be back in a week's time . Can I leave my luggage here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sure . We do have a storage service . When will you be checking out tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then shall we arrange the bellboy to pick up your luggage at 9:00 ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I have your room number , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 1218 . We'll collect you luggage at 9:00 tomorrow . Would you then come to the Front Desk to get your storage receipt , please ?
segments.speaker: S1
